All Classes

Class Description
BlockingPlayer
The subclass of RandomPlayer class, that first looks at the board for a move that would block its opponent from winning on the next move.
Board
Provides a text-based game board for the "tic-tac-toe" game, and enables adding marks while providing methods to the game board and methods to check if any Player object has reached a win or tie situation.
Constants
An interface to provide several constants.
Game
Provides a command line user interface to receive user input and constructs four types of Player objects, Referee object, and Board object.
HumanPlayer
The subclass of Player class, that will provide user interface to human players.
Player
Provides a command line user interface to prompt current Player to enter cell coordinates, add corresponding mark to Board object, checks winning status, and pass the turn to opponents.
RandomGenerator  
RandomPlayer
Subclass of Player class, represents a player type that uses a random generator and picks a vacant spot on the board, randomly.
Referee
Initiates the game by displaying the board, sets opponent relationships and calls the play method for the X-Player who is always the first player.
SmartPlayer
The subclass of BlockingPlayer class, that first looks at the board for a move that could win, or would block its opponent from winning on the next move.
